name: Galactic Faction Wars
description:
INITIAL 50% OFF RELEASE SALE of $2.50! 

Description

Take your pick of 32 different ships each with with 2 guns across 8 different factions in this chaotic 2D spaceship shooter. The game has several different levels each with custom built visuals and some unique mechanics. Fight your way to one of the final bosses in the roguelite single player mode as you improve your ship along the way. Collect temporary powerups within each match to overpower your enemies! 

Features
  • 32 Ships
    • 8 Factions, 4 ships per faction
    • 2 Guns per ship
  • 7 Different types of weapons
    • Lasers, railguns, missiles, shotguns, grenade launchers, beams, disc launchers
  • 7 Game Modes
    • Endless, Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Last Ship Alive, Last Faction Alive, Ship Swarm, Boss Fight
  • Powerups
    • Temporary and permanent
    • Damage, move speed, rotate speed, reload etc.
  • Multiplayer via controllers
  • 2 Final bosses
  • Physics force based movement, missiles,  explosions
Feedback

Constructive feedback welcome and happy to hear out any small ideas for guns or other things to add to the game for your pleasure :)
